text: "Baby It's Cold Outside" is a song by the American rock band Pezband. It was written by the group's lead singer, Mimi Betinis. The song was originally featured on the 1977 album Pezband, but has since been released on the 2012 reissue, "Pezband (Remastered)". ==References== Category:1977 songs
title: Baby It's Cold Outside (Pezband song)
